questions.question: What two things must you always wear in the construction lab?

choices.answer: An apron and safety glasses
Close toed shoes and a hard hat
Safety glasses and close toed shoes
A hard hat and an apron

questions.question: You need a hair tie when your hair is how long?

choices.answer: At your ears
Past your shoulders
At the middle of your back
At your waist

questions.question: Which of the following items is it OK to leave on in the construction lab?

choices.answer: Earbuds as long as they are in your ears
long scarves
Small earrings that do not dangle past your ear lobes
Watches

questions.question: What is a type of eye protection we do not have in the shop?

choices.answer: Face shields
Safety glasses that go over prescription glasses
Regular Safety Glasses
Welding masks

questions.question: You should never attempt first aid yourself

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: What is the number one rule of first aid?

choices.answer: If you canâ€™t move, send someone for help
Know where the band-aids are
Have a trained person administer first aid
Let the teacher know what happened

questions.question: If you're diligent about identifying hazards and following safety rules, accidents never happen

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: The first step in clean up is...

choices.answer: Wait by the door
1 students can go around the whole lab with the dust mop
Put away your project
Turn off the machines

questions.question: When cleaning up, after you turn off the machines you need to...

choices.answer: Wait by the door
Sweep the floor around your work area
Put away your project in your bin
Turn off the machines

questions.question: Where does your project and project pieces go?

choices.answer: On one of the upper shelves
In your locker
In your clear bin in the cabinet assigned to your class
Safely placed on the side ledge

questions.question: When cleaning up, if you are not sure where something goes, you should...

choices.answer: Tell a friend to do it
Put it on Mr. Roffey's desk
Ask
Just leave it on the workbench

questions.question: The goal of clean up is...

choices.answer: To make it look like you were never there
To leave it cleaner than you found it
To put away all the tools
To make the shop look nice
